name: Brewing
description: Brewing is the process of creating $(l:brewing/potion_types#potion)$(item)Potions$(), $(l:brewing/potion_types#splash_potion)$(item)Splash Potions$(), and $(l:brewing/potion_types#lingering_potion)$(item)Lingering Potions$() by adding various ingredients to $(item)Water Bottles$() in a $(l:useables/brewing_stand)$(item)Brewing Stand$().
